lead_paragraph: The Naval Academy Preparatory School and the Naval Academy Foundation help Navy land football players and other athletes who would normally be rejected through the admissions process.

headline.print_headline: Navy Opens Back Door, and in Come Athletes
headline.main: Navy Opens a Back Door, and In Come Athletes and Victories

snippet: The Naval Academy Preparatory School and the Naval Academy Foundation help Navy land football players and other athletes who would normally be rejected through the admissions process....
abstract: Joe Nocera Sports Business column says improbable success of Naval Academy's football team is explained by funneling players who might not meet its normal admissions standards from its Rhode Island prep school.
